name: THE ANASTASIA WAIST TRAINER - WORKOUT BAND
description:
The Anastasia  {NO ROLL DOWNS ON ANY GARMENTS}
can be worn by beginners, while sleeping, and during a light workout. A great place to start to get those serious curves and see results within days.

DeSiGNED TO;
To accelerate weight loss through compression and sweating process, it also helps to mold your figure and support your back. 
**FIRM and SUPERIOR boning that immediately corrects posture, reduces waistline, firms and flattens the tummy. 
Controls waist and abdomen keeping it always coke bottle correct.

HELPS WITH:
The conditions of weight gain, lower back pain, postpartum, C-section, abdominal surgical procedures, and overweight due to pregnancy and maternity. 

MADE OF: 
Natural Latex to give you maximum abdominal support 
Body Fabric: 97% Cotton 3% Elastane Lining: 100% Natural Hevea 
Latex Imported 

HOW TO WEAR:
**1 to 3 hours on the first week and gradually increase the length of time you wear it, until you feel comfortable enough. 
Thereafter, it’s recommended to use it from 8 to 10 hours daily. 

SIZING:
CHOOSE SIZE Corresponding to your measurements in order to prevent discomfort during use or damage.  It is suggested you order according to your shirt size. name: THE SASHA LONG CORSET BLACK
description:
Sasha is manufactured with 100% latex that is tightened enough to reduce your measurements and also adjust to your body. Reduces 2 body sizes from the waist and abdomen. It does not have any straps. Helps define waistline. 
Perfect for use during the postpartum period. 
The bra is not included. It can be worn with any bra. 
It has two rows of hooks and eyes closures in the front. 
Can't be worn while working out.
You should not select a smaller size in order to be tightened enough or to achieve a better result. 
Select your correct size based on your measurements using the sizing chart provided for each product; 
For more sizing
Email us your measurements and we will respond quickly with your correct size suggestion. 
adrakesproduction@gmail.com

name: THE LOLA-  NON LATEX STRAPELESS SHAPEWEAR
description:
If you want to define your waist, Enhance your figure, Reduce waist and back, and Lift busts. {no roll downs}

**Wear this waist cincher 

LOLA Vs. SASHA

-SASHA is complete latex, the most aggressive of the strapless models. 

-LOLA is a fusion of Latex and lyrca, so it can be a less aggressive compression than Sasha, but still gets the job done.
 
DESIGNED TO:
Help you reduce up to 10cm (2.5 inches). 

MADE OF:
Slimming waist cincher made of a combination of smooth fabrics that offers firm compression and extra abdominal control.
 

Light structure with flexible boning defines and accentuates the waistline comfortably. Thermal waistbands offers greater compression eliminating stored fat on the lower back and tummy area. Firm abdominal support accelerates recovery from C-sections, abdominal surgical procedures, and post partum. It also facilitates the breastfeeding period.
 
**Gently corrects posture 
**Made of High-compression Latex 
**Double Positioning Hook and Eye for maximum Function 
**Lined with 100% Cotton Lycra
**Target Areas: Waist, Abdomen and Back 
**Control Level: Extra Control

name: THE NATASHA CORSET VEST THICK STRAPS
description:
The Natasha {NO ROLL DOWNS}
Body shaper vest reduces waist instantly using this vest style. 

DESIGNED TO:
Accelerate weight loss through compression and sweating process, it also helps to mold your figure and support your back. 
The non adjustable strap model provides the most coverage of the upper back area. Hip shaping girdle helps to lose weight and eliminate toxins through sweat and compress. 
**Firm and superior boning that immediately corrects posture, reduces waistline, firms and flattens the tummy and lower pooch area. 
**Controls waist and abdomen keeping it always coke bottle correct. Non-Adjustable straps with a braless body shaper provides great bust Flexible boning defines and accentuates the waistline. 

HELPS WITH: 
The conditions of weight gain, lower back pain, postpartum, C-section, abdominal surgical procedures, and overweight due to pregnancy and maternity. 

MADE OF: 
Natural Latex to give you maximum abdominal support 
Body Fabric: 97% Cotton 3% Elastane 
Lining: 100% Natural Hevea Latex Imported 

WEAR: 
1 to 3 hours on the first week and gradually increase the length of time you wear it, until you feel comfortable enough. Thereafter, it’s recommended to use it from 8 to 10 hours daily. Choose the size corresponding to your measurements in order to prevent discomfort during use or damage of the girdle. 

**The Natasha should not be worn while sleeping, when taking showers, in steam baths or saunas. 
If you have physical problems, consult your doctor before wearing the girdle.

**Note: We recommend measuring your waist for the inch size, and if in between please go up one. Please follow the size chart carefully or email if in doubt or For more info adrakesproduction@gmail.com
